subject: Hockey, Ice
Officiating (Sports)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Eyes and Eyesight
lead_paragraph: Mr. Chadwick became a Hall of Fame referee in the National Hockey League despite losing his sight in one eye and was later a popular broadcaster for the Rangers.
snippet: Mr. Chadwick became a Hall of Fame referee in the National Hockey League despite losing his sight in one eye and was later a popular broadcaster for the Rangers.
